translation.accountReady: Asusu ya shirya! Karɓi token ɗinka.
translation.firstStep: Matakin farko na karɓar token ɗinka na kyauta.
translation.successBalanceUpdating: An yi nasara! Balance ɗinka yana sabuntawa.
translation.getSmallAmount: Sami SUPRA kadan don gwada network—ba sai ka sayi komai ba.
translation.supraDescription: Supra wani sabon ƙarni ne na Layer-1 blockchain wanda ya mayar da hankali kan sauri, ƙananan kuɗin caji wajen tura kuɗi (fees), da sauƙaƙawa masu gina apps aiki. SUPRA token ne ke tafiyar da dukkan ayyuka, shugabanci, da fasahohin zamani kamar real-time oracles da tsarin sarrafa ayyuka (automation) wanda ke sa apps sauri da sauƙi ga masu amfani. Yi tunaninsa a matsayin blockchain da aka gina domin ƙungiyoyi su kaddamar da apps masu amfani ba tare da fuskantar jinkiri ko tsadar kuɗi ba.
translation.whySupraIsDifferent: Me ya sa Supra ya bambanta?
translation.ultraFast: Gudu sosai da rahusa: An tsara shi don aiwatar da aiki nan take tare da kuɗi kalilan.
translation.realTimeData: Bayanan take-yanke: Oracles da aka gina a ciki suna kawo bayanan yau da kullun zuwa smart contracts.
translation.automationReady: Shirye don automation: Yana da kayan aiki na asali don tsara ayyuka da gudanar da su a on-chain cikin amana.
translation.developerFriendly: Sauƙi ga masu gina:apps SDKs da gadoji (bridges) don ayyuka su kaddamar da kansu cikin sauri.
translation.whatIsThisFaucetFor: Akan me yasa Ake amfani da wannan faucet ɗin?
translation.faucetPurpose: Wannan faucet ɗin yana ba da ɗan adadin SUPRA ne domin kowa ya iya bincikar network ɗin ba tare da ya kashe kuɗinsa ba. Ya dace sosai da sababbin shiga masu gwada wallet ko dApp, masu Gina apps (developers) masu gwada fasahohi, da sauran masu sha'awar koyo ta hanyar aikatawa.
translation.connectWalletStep: Haɗa wallet ɗin da ya dace (misali: Starkey).
translation.verifyStep: Tantancewa — za a yi bincike na atomatik don tabbatar da ba a amfani da tsarin ta hanyar cuta.
translation.claimStep: Karɓa — danna maballin sannan ka karɓi token a on-chain cikin daƙiƙoƙi.
translation.tip: Shawara: Karɓa ɗaya kacal ga kowane adireshi. Idan ka fuskanci matsala, duba tsarin network na wallet ɗinka ko tuntuɓi masu taimako.
translation.readyToTry: Ka shirya don gwada Supra? Haɗa wallet ɗinka ka karɓi token — sannan ka duba dApps, ƙara liquidity, ko gina naka aikin. Idan kana buƙatar taƙaitaccen bayani na banner ko mobile, zan iya shirya maka.
translation.tokensAvailable: Token da ke Akwai a Faucet

SuccessModal.title: Transaction ya yi Nasara!

translation.joinSupraCommunity: Shiga community na Supra (ba na hukuma ba) a <link>Telegram</link> don samun sabbin labarai.
